# init(image:target:action:)

**Initializer**

Creates a standard push button with the image you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(image: NSImage, target: Any?, action: Selector?)
```

## Parameters

- **image**: The image to display in the body of the button.
- **target**: The target object that receives action messages from the button.
- **action**: The action message the button sends to the target.

## Discussion

Set the image’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImage/accessibilityDescription] property to ensure accessibility for this control.

## Creating standard buttons

- **init(checkboxWithTitle:target:action:)**: Creates a standard checkbox with the title you specify.
- **init(radioButtonWithTitle:target:action:)**: Creates a standard radio button with the title you specify.
- **init(title:image:target:action:)**: Creates a standard push button with a title and image.
- **init(title:target:action:)**: Creates a standard push button with the title you specify.
